column5: The apartment is upstairs of my home with a private entrance and balcony that overlooks the private yard, decks and It is centrally located 5 houses from bus, 6 blocks from train station, close to DT Dallas, Baylor Hospital, State Fair, Deep Ellum, and Uptown. Includes kitchenette, full bath, queen bed, dining area, desk and space to relax. Air Bed available on request. Washer and dryer available for use when owner is home. On street parking.
